text: Institut aéronautique et spatial (IAS) is the French aeronautical industry's education coordinator. IAS was created in 1980. It is in Toulouse.L'Institut aéronautique et spatial IAS members are the major aeronautics & space companies such as EADS, Safran, Thales, Dassault Aviation, Airbus, Eurocopter, and others: == Mission == Its aim is to develop a network of international partners, using 3 main vectors: * Academic training with graduation; * Continuing education and professional trainings; * Support for research cooperation == References == == Other websites == * IAS website Category:Aviation in France Category:Education in France Category:Aerospace engineering Category:1980 establishments in France Category:Toulouse
title: Institut aéronautique et spatial
